thread.title: Serena Williams surprises, challenges random guys at public tennis court
thread.title_full: Serena Williams surprises, challenges random guys at public tennis court

author: Tom Gatto (tgatto@sportingnews.com)
title: Serena Williams surprises, challenges random guys at public tennis court
text:
February 27, 2017 9:01pm   9:01pm EST The greatest women's tennis player of all time had her own battle of the sexes (OK, it wasn't a battle). Serena Williams (Getty Images) 
Updated at 9:01 p.m. ET 
Updated at 9:01 p.m. ET 
Serena Williams is between grand slam tournaments, so she needs to do something to stay sharp. 
Like, say, visiting a public court and challenging random players. 
MORE: Serena part of Nike's star-studded equality ad 
Williams did that to two guys Sunday night in San Francisco. She was out for a walk with her fiance and her dog and decided to stop.Â 
Now, we never see Williams actually hit in the two-minute video that was posted to Snapchat; the only "highlight" is of one of the fellows hitting a ball into the net.Â 
Otherwise, the "action" is Serena surprising the lads, engaging in small talk, and then teasing the rest of the world. 
"The moral of the story is, you never know when I'm coming to a tennis court near you," she said with a laugh. 
If Serena's starting up her own tennis tour, count us in. Watch This
